title: The Spiritual Meaning Behind Waking up at 4 am

steps.title: Your spirit guides are sending you messages.
steps.content: Your spirit guides are sending you messages. Pay close attention when you wake up at 4 am, as this is commonly a sign that your spirit guides and guardian angels have something to tell you. They might wake you up to remind you of your soul’s mission if your spirituality has taken the back burner. Or, they might be warning you about a potential danger or making you aware of something to expect in your spiritual journey. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You are being guided toward your purpose.
steps.content: You are being guided toward your purpose. Waking up at 4 am is often your spirit guide’s and guardian angel’s way to remind you why you’re on this earth. If you’ve been feeling unsure about your path, this is your literal wake-up call to reclaim your purpose. At 4 am, your spirit guides are right by your side to help you find your way. [2] X Research source

steps.title: A transition or change is coming.
steps.content: A transition or change is coming. Waking up when 4 am hits is a huge sign that an important life or spiritual change is on the horizon. The dark, quiet hours of 4 am are perfect for reflecting on your purpose and putting together the puzzle pieces of what’s next. You are growing aware of all the possibilities in front of you and what you need to do to make them reality. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You need to center and ground yourself.
steps.content: You need to center and ground yourself. Jolting awake at 4 am might be a sign that you need to regain balance. Daily stress and worries might be drawing your focus from the present, throwing your mind and body out of whack. Take this as a sign to meditate, center yourself, and cleanse your spirit of negative energy. [4] X Research source

steps.title: You are in denial about something.
steps.content: You are in denial about something. Sometimes, waking up at 4 am means that there’s an issue in your life that you’re not facing. Because you’re not taking it on while you’re awake, your subconscious is waking you up now to take care of it. The peaceful hour of 4 am is your time to let go of your fears and listen to what your body and soul are telling you. [5] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source Oftentimes the things you aren’t facing are your desire to stay in the past and fear of the future. It’s completely normal to be in this place, but to grow and move on, understand that the past is the past. Use your time at 4 am to practice acceptance . Then, focus on your present.

steps.title: You are having a spiritual awakening or breakthrough.
steps.content: You are having a spiritual awakening or breakthrough. If everyday life has gotten in the way of your journey, waking up at 4 am might be a sign to reconnect with your spirituality . If you are connected, 4 am often means that you are coming to a breakthrough in your life. You are reaching a new path, goal, or purpose and your spirit guides are on the other side ready to give you answers. [6] X Research source

steps.title: 4 am is when the veil between the physical and spiritual realm is thinnest.
steps.content: 4 am is when the veil between the physical and spiritual realm is thinnest. Often called the witching hour, this is when you are closest to your spirit guides and guardian angels. Your guides and angels often connect with you during this time because their messages, guidance, and energy are clearer and more powerful. [7] X Research source Because the physical and spiritual realms are more connected, 4 am is often a great time to access higher planes and energies of existence. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Write down your spirit guides’ messages.
steps.content: Write down your spirit guides’ messages. When you wake up at 4 am, listen to what your spirit guides and guardian angels are telling you. Write down everything that you heard and felt so you have it to decode it in the morning. When you go back to sleep, give gratitude and thanks to your guides for delivering their message. [9] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source If you were dreaming, write down what was happening, too. Your guides might contact and guide you through your dreams.

steps.title: Meditate and work on your manifestations.
steps.content: Meditate and work on your manifestations. After being woken up, take some time to mediate . This can help you receive your spirit guides’ messages and download their guidance. It is also a great time to refocus and reconnect your spiritual energy if you’re feeling out of balance. Take this time to state your affirmations and manifest your desired reality. [10] X Research source
